00014 bool ORMCA927Decoder::SetDataRecord(UInt_t* dataRecord)

00020 
00021 size_t ORMCA927Decoder::CopyWaveformData(UInt_t* waveform, size_t len)
00022 //copies the waveform data to the array pointed to by
00023 //waveform, which is of length len
00024 {
00025   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00026   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00027   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00028     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len 
00029                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00030   }
00031   else {
00032     len = GetWaveformLen(); 
00033   }
00034   UInt_t* waveformData = GetWaveformDataPointer();
00035   memcpy(waveform, waveformData, sizeof(UInt_t)*len);
00036   return len;
00037 }
00038 
00039 size_t ORMCA927Decoder::CopyWaveformDataDouble(double* waveform, size_t len)
00040 //copies the waveform data to the array pointed to by
00041 //waveform, which is of length len
00042 {
00043   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00044   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00045   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00046     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len 
00047                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00048   }
00049   else {
00050     len = GetWaveformLen(); 
00051   }
00052   UInt_t* waveformData = GetWaveformDataPointer();
00053   for(size_t i=0;i<len;i++) {
00054     waveform[i] = (Double_t) waveformData[i];  
00055   }
00056   return len;
00057 }

00060 //Error checking: **********************************************************************
00061 bool ORMCA927Decoder::IsValid() 
00062 { 
00063   ORLog(kDebug) << "IsValid(): starting... " << std::endl;
00064   if(IsShort(fDataRecord)) { 
00065     ORLog(kError) << "Data file is short" << std::endl; 
00066     return false;
00067   } 
00068   return true;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void ORMCA927Decoder::DumpBufferHeader()
00072 {
00073   if(fDataRecord)
00074   {
00075     ORLog(kDebug) << "Dumping Data Buffer Header (Raw Data): " << std::endl;
00076     ORLog(kDebug) << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00077     for(size_t i=1;i<kBufHeadLen; i++)
00078     {
00079       ORLog(kDebug) << fDataRecord[i] << std::endl;
00080     }
00081     ORLog(kDebug) << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00082   }
00083 }
00084 
00085 //debugging: *************************************************************************
00086 void ORMCA927Decoder::Dump(UInt_t* dataRecord) //debugging 
00087 {
00088   ORLog(kDebug) << std::endl << std::endl << "ORMCA927Decoder::Dump():" << std::endl ;
00089   if(!SetDataRecord(dataRecord)) return; 
00090   ORLog(kDebug) << "  Header functions: " << std::endl
00091     << "    Device = " << GetDevice() << std::endl
00092     << "    The header is " << kBufHeadLen << " (32-bit) words long" << std::endl
00093     << "    The channel is " << GetChannelNum() << std::endl
00094     << "    LiveTime: " << GetLiveTime() << std::endl
00095     << "    RealTime: " << GetRealTime() << std::endl
00096     << "    The waveform data has " << GetWaveformLen() << " (32-bit) words" << std::endl;
00097 }

00099 UInt_t ORMCA927Decoder::GetEventWaveformPoint( size_t /*event*/, 
00100                                                                                            size_t waveformPoint )
00101 {
00102   return (UInt_t)GetWaveformDataPointer()[waveformPoint]; 
00103 }
